news.title: PUP Announce Live Album, Documentary, and Zine
news.summary: The band is commemorating its Megacity Madness tour with a bevy of archival material

news.title: Dry Cleaning Reschedule 2026 Tour Dates Due to “Hostile Economic Forces”
news.summary: The band has also shared the video for a new song, “Let Me Grow and You’ll See the Fruit”
